# Telemetry Docs

> Documentation for Telemetry Docs.

*Topics available: 5*

- [Networking Event Counters](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/fundamentals/networking/telemetry/event-counters.md): Learn how to consume .NET networking event counters.
- [Networking events](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/fundamentals/networking/telemetry/events.md): Learn how to consume and correlate .NET networking telemetry events.
- [Networking metrics](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/fundamentals/networking/telemetry/metrics.md): Learn how to consume .NET networking Metrics.
- [Networking Telemetry](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/fundamentals/networking/telemetry/overview.md): Overview of networking telemetry tools in .NET.
- [Networking tracing](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/fundamentals/networking/telemetry/tracing.md): Learn how to consume .NET networking tracing.
